title: My profile got banned
body: i got my profile banned for no reason at all until January 5th but, that is todays date and i'm still restricted. can anyone tell me what happened ?

replies.body: Don't bans have a time associated with them? I thought I heard Noon Pacific time.
so you're thinking ill get out at noon?
If you're in the Pacific Timezone. Then again, it might go a full 14 days \* 24 hours from when you were banned. I'd check the email you got on it.
Correct! There's a time stamp associated with it - it's not just based on the date in general.
